it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIView, TerminalView

    public abstract class View
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    Class that represent the Abstract View of the MVC, it handles all the input/output methods for the game
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
